ygData.subject: Re: Newbie spells in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Several first circle spells, including cavorting bones are sold by a vendor in the guild hall, you have to head left after you enter the first room with the
ygData.messageBody:
Several first circle spells, including cavorting bones are sold by a vendor
in the guild hall, you have to head left after you enter the first room with
the guildleader, through the broken out tunnel, there are several merchants
around that bend, one (a male if I remember correctly) will have your pet.


> hi!
>
> I'm a newbie human (gasp!) necro starting off in Freeport. I was wondering
> which vendor in the guild sells that pet spell, cavorting bones. I've seen
> the spell, leering corpse, but not that rank 1 spell. Could anyone please
> help? it's not that big a deal since I can get to 4 w/o a pet, but I'd
just
> like to add it to my pool of info.
>
> Thanks for any info.
>
